rationale: Although Botia histrionica is rare in catches and is harvested for its ornamental value which is a threat, the range is wide. It is hence assessed as Least Concern.  If impacts of harvest and threats become apparent, this species must be evaluated accordingly in future.
evaluator: Rema Devi, K.R., Vishwanath, W., Dahanukar, N., Arunachalam, M., Daniel, B.A. & Molur, S.
